name: SupremeNerd fangames archive
description:
Some old fangames from around 2016-18 when I used an Gamejolt account called the "Supreme Nerd". The account was deleted due to frustration with game development, bad luck getting noticed and general inexperience.

This part of the SupremeNerd archives focuses on fangames, mostly FNaF. Despite my dissapointment with the franchise in general, I still enjoy the first game's ideas and some of the quality fangames.

EPILEPSY WARNING: ALL OF THESE GAMES CONTAIN FLASHING LIGHTS.

1. Me + My Friends

A point-and-click game based on the pilot episode of "The Backyardigans", which I never saw (check special thanks section below for an explanation). You explore a decrepit building using an elevator while avoiding some humanoid monsters, The goal is to find the Backyardigans suits. Each one will take you to a specific minigame that you have to complete. I highly recommend reading the "how to play" sections as some mechanics are not explained during gameplay.

2. RE_location

A demo for a FNaF fangame made while trying to learn Clickteam. It's just 1 night an only contains 2 active enemies. There's some cutscenes and a minigame but I totally forgot what the lore for this thing was.

3. Seven Nights With Pinchface

Another FNaF fangame, this time with characters from Nickelodeon bumpers as antagonist. This one is fully complete, containing 7 nights as the title states.

Special thanks:

  • obscuritySTA : original ideas for Me + My Friends & Seven Nights With Pinchface
  • adventurefoxy389 : voice actor for the Me + My Friends intro and game over screen.

I actually tried to to a game with FNaF's "sit-n-survive" formula recently, but making it original enough to not be considered a fangame:
